testcase.classname: Validation of booking page in adactinhotel web application
testcase.name: TC01_Validation of booking page with valid inputs
testcase.system-out: Given User launch adactinhotel web page.....................................passed When User enters valid "saravanakrish" and valid "2KX7V8"...................passed And User clicks the login button and search hotel page should be opened.....passed When User select the "Paris","Hotel Hervey","Super Deluxe","1 - One","1 - One" and "1 - One".passed And User clicks the search button and select hotel page should be opened....passed When User select the radio button...........................................passed And User clicks the continue button.........................................passed When User enters "saravanan","krish", "Erode", "1234567891234567","VISA","November","2022" and "2234".passed And User clicks Book now button and order number should be displayed........passed
